definition[0]: used to say that it does not matter which thing or person is chosen because the result will be the same
example[0]: It will be a difficult operation, whichever method you choose.
example[1]: Whichever way you look at it, things are pretty bad.
definition[1]: used to refer to the member of a group of people or things that does something, is wanted, is possible etc
example[2]: Whichever player scores the highest number of points will be the winner.
example[3]: You can either have the double room or the family room, whichever you want.
example[4]: ‘Do you want tea or coffee?’ ‘I don’t mind – whichever one you’re making.’
